pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Live Colour Pastels Dusty Lavender
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Re-create the latest trend and achieve stunning pastel tones with Schwarzkopf LIVE Colour Pastels

Re-create the latest trend and achieve stunning pastel tones with Schwarzkopf Live Colour Pastels by Ultra Brights. Get the perfect pastel dip-dye, highlights or all over colour. 

The ready to use formula requires no pre-mixing and works in just 2 minutes! 

Change your hair colour as often as you like with Schwarzkopf Live Colour Pastels by Ultra Brights! 

Gentle Conditioning Colour:

- Enriched with a colour mask that adds superior condition and shine.

- Gentle formula contains no peroxide or ammonia.

- Will not lighten hair.

- Lasts up to 6 to 8 washes.

'Get the perfect pastel dip-dye, highlights or all over colour. The ready to use formula requires no pre-mixing and works in minutes!
Change your hair colour as often as you like with Schwarzkopf LIVE Colour Pastels!

Boxed Contents: 30mL sachet of colour, instruction leaflet, gloves.

Size: 30mL

Hair Colour: Pastels Dusty Lavender

Warnings

Keep out of reach of children.
WARNING: THIS PRODUCT CONTAINS INGREDIENTS WHICH MAY CAUSE SKIN IRRITATION TO CERTAIN INDIVIDUALS.
A PRELIMINARY TEST ACCORDING TO THE ACCOMPANYING DIRECTIONS SHOULD BE MADE BEFORE USE.
THIS PRODUCT MUST NOT BE USED FOR DYEING EYELASHES OR EYEBROWS; TO DO SO MAY BE INJURIOUS TO THE EYE.

CAUTION

CAUTION
Keep out of reach of children. Read safety directions.

Ingredients

Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Coconut Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Methylparaben, Parfum, Polyquaternium-6, Propylparaben, Etidronic Acid, Ethanolamine, HC Blue No. 16, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Benzoate, Basic Red 51, Basic Violet 2

Directions

1. Shampoo and towel dry hair.
2. Apply colour and leave on for 2 to 15 minutes.
3. Rinse thoroughly and style as usual.
We recommend using two packs or more if your hair is longer than chin length.
